titleStmt.title: A new prophecy, or, A prophetical discourse of the blazing-star that appeared April the 23d, 1677 being a full account of the events & sad effects thereof which threaten these nations of England, Scotland, &c., as likewise to France, Holland, &c. / John Holwell ...
titleStmt.author: Holwell, John, 1649-1686?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the request of the author,
